title: Kiswahili Speach to Text
Desc: I successfully designed and implemented a Kiswahili Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR) model from scratch using the Nemo framework. The model achieved an impressive accuracy of 74%. To make it accessible to the community, I deployed the model on Hugging Face. You can find my model on Hugging Face's model hub at the following link: huggingface.co/de-coder/stt_sw_ctc_model. It has garnered attention with a total of 67 downloads, showcasing its popularity and practicality in the ASR domain.

title: Mailer
Desc: I have successfully developed both single and bulk mailer applications, showcasing my proficiency in email communication systems. These applications were designed to streamline and enhance the email sending process, offering users the capability to send individual messages or efficiently manage large-scale email campaigns. My focus on user-friendly interfaces and robust functionality ensures a seamless experience for both individual users and organizations, contributing to effective and efficient email communication.
